entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IntermediateAssembly should be used in ILC inputs #99731
    9.0.0
  • Do block predecessor lists need to be sorted? #99730
    Future
  • GC\Regressions\v2.0-beta2\452950\452950\452950.cmd failing on Mono minijit Windows x64 #99729
  • TimeZoneInfo_DisplayNameStartsWithOffset failures for Syria and Greenland #99727
    9.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.Tests.BerConverterTests.Decode_Bytes_ReturnsExpected failing on Windows x86 #99725
  • SocketException (10054) while trying to post byte array to a HTTPS server in dotnet 6 with HTTPClient #99724
  • IComparable<T>.CompareTo<T> inconsistencies #99722
  • `NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged` is always returning IsAvailable = true on Android #99721
  • Missing repo tag: v7.0.17 #99707
  • Dependency Injection: Required Properties #99692
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher.Match does not work with the ".." pattern. #99691
  • [wasm] Codespaces cannot auto-setup, no space left #99690
  • HttpClient does not support cleartext HTTP/2 over http(s) proxies #99689
  • [NativeAot] win-x86: Funclets getting double called #99687
  • [wasm] CreateGoodBreakpointAndHit failure #99686
  • JsonSerializer deserialization using overloads taking Utf8JsonReader are unexpectedly slower than equivalents taking string #99674
  • Dotnet Package for centos not installing from https://packages.microsoft.com/centos/8/prod/Packages/d/ #99672
  • STJ source generator fails when defining the serializer context in 2 partial classes #99669
  • Is it possible to use a same dotnet.wasm with different but similary assemblies when RunAOTCompilation is true #99668
  • Infinite recursion between System.Threading.Lock and System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ClassConstructorRunner in NativeAOT #99663
    9.0.0
  • Avoid unnecessary extra indirection in allocation helpers #99661
  • LSRA: Add support to track more than 64 registers #99658
  • [7.0] Test failure in Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_AllocatingSpan.Decrypt_Pkcs1_ErrorsForInvalidPadding #99652

Closed

  • MethodNotFoundException in net8 #96268
    9.0.0
  • False positives for IL3050, despite runtime feature checks #97273
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add PersistedAssemblyBuilder type #97015
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add FileNotFoundException.ThrowIfNotFound throw helper. #96312
  • Address high-severity vulnerability CVE-2023-29331 in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml 6.0.1 and 7.0.1 #98827
  • Need to delay type loading error until runtime for array of T with ByRefLike type #99165
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Support AcceptByRefLike metadata generic param attribute #94421
    9.0.0
  • Possibly incorrect version numbers for the VS.Redist.Common.NetCore.* packages #99680
  • WASM: dotnet-resources cache added to every path of a SPA #99642
  • [browser][ws] WebSocket works differently depending on if we look up its state or not #99545
    9.0.0
  • `DiagnosticListener` disposal does not remove existing subscriptions #99523
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24160.1] Freesql error: Ambiguous match found for 'System.TimeSpan System.TimeSpan FromSeconds(Int64)'. #99588
  • NativeAOT doesn't work with Linux non-portable build #66859
    9.0.0
  • [outerloop] RegexKnownPatternTests.RecreationalRegex_Rectangle either fails with `Specified argument was out of the range of valid values.` or times out #98962
    9.0.0
  • Performance optimization suggestion for Enum.Value.ToString() #62976
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a collection expression to assign the IID in GeneratedComInterface-generated code #99734
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • NativeAOT: Removed LLVM ObjWriter and LLVM dependency #99733
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use IntermediateAssembly instead of hard-coding the equivalent path #99732
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Oracle Linux support #99728
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Implement GetConservativeUpperBoundForOutgoingArgs #99726
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add option to --produce_repro in superpmi.py script #99723
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Workaround for issue #97272 when building tests #99720
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove dead code in MCC tests that causes compilation failure on NativeAOT win-x86 #99719
    arch-x86, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT/win-x86: Enable FEATURE_EH_CALLFINALLY_THUNKS #99718
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [7.0] Rename MSBuild property MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicVersion -> MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicSchannelVersion #99715
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [8.0] Rename MSBuild property MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicVersion -> MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicSchannelVersion #99714
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Rename MSBuild property MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicVersion -> MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicSchannelVersion #99713
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][eventpipe] Fix firing dynamic method wrappers crash #99712
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • Adjust allocation behavior for type system to attempt to reduce TLB c… #99709
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revise test tolerances for exp functions. #99708
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Add limited constant propagation to the jiterpreter for ldc.i4 and ldloca #99706
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Support frozen struct returns for Swift calls #99704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HTTP/2 WebSocket Abort #99703
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Backport VMR patch for cross builds #99702
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Update wasm docs. #99699
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #99695
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][ws] Do not duplicate code executed in `local_on_close` #99685
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][interp] Various optimizations for box patterns used in byreflike struct generics #99684
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [QUIC] Updated MsQuic version #99681
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Clean up some call multi-reg ret handling #99679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] [HTTP/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame (#99502) #99678
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HTTP/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame (#99502) #99677
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Move `GenerateJSModuleManifest` from pack to sdk #99675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][browser] WebSocket works differently depending on if we look up its state or not #99673
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Test globaization ci #99671
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #99666
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Windows.Extensions package readme #99665
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #99664
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • JIT: Do not set the code offsets for BBF_INTERNAL blocks #99662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use \e instead of \u001B or \x1B #99659
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #99656
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

Merged

  • Add 0/null checks for various cases in the COM/dynamic VARIANT extensions #99631
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Guard ToolboxItem by a new feature switch #99647
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Use attributes for IsDynamicCodeSupported feature switch #99641
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Make PersistedAssemblyBuilder public and update all references #99660
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [7.0] Append job attempt number to log artifact name to get rid of file exists failure on reattempts #99711
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [6.0] Append job attempt number to log artifact name to get rid of file exists failure on reattempts #99710
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][eventpipe] Fix firing dynamic method wrappers crash #99617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve precision of the vectorized trig functions #99549
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Delete Decrypt_Pkcs1_ErrorsForInvalidPadding #99653
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-bug
  • [release/7.0-staging] Delete Decrypt_Pkcs1_ErrorsForInvalidPadding #99654
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-bug
  • [release/6.0-staging] Delete Decrypt_Pkcs1_ErrorsForInvalidPadding #99655
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-bug
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always keep global symbols on ApplePlatforms #99650
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • [wasm][mt] Fix MT option in container configs #99683
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][ws] Fix WebSocket state propagation delay in `ReceiveAsync` #99612
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • [Wasm] Update boot.json manifest generation order #99525
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Do not allow DynamicCodeSupport=true for NativeAOT #99590
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow using VS to run host tests when libraries use different config #91873
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [wasm][mt] Add MT option to container configs #99615
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Support frozen structs for Swift pinvokes #99294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99357
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Don't set ENABLE_WERROR in VMR CI build in mono.proj #99604
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix disposal bug in `DiagnosticListener` #99657
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Build NAOT runtime packs for linux-bionic-arm #99667
    area-Infrastructure
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Port arm64 INLINE_GETTHREAD from NativeAOT #99648
    arch-arm64, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Make SpinLock class smaller #99618
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix AsyncVoidMethodBuilder race condition around SynchronizationContext #99640
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.x
  • Disable NORETURN annotation on PROCAbort for Arm #99587
    area-PAL-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Reduce locking around TypeVarTypeDesc creation #97531
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99585
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [mono] CodeQL fix set #1 #99637
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Fix stack walking for new eh 4 #99624
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Improve perf\allocs of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #99383
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #99586
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: enable edge checks throughout #99628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #99651
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Avoid using native layout info to calculate register flags for small structs where possible #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mt][browser] Prevent `SignalRClientTests` fail with "PlaywrightException: Target closed" #99537
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix AV in HttpTelemetry.WriteEvent #99607
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Add data stream library #99442
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #99632
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading.Tasks, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can minor version updates in .NET SDK have breaking changes? #39473
  • `dotnet test` runs test assemblies in parallel #39470

Closed

  • [9.0-preview.1] Output from dotnet test when test process crashes is not shown to user with MSBUILDTERMINALLOGGER #39156

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #39502
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39501
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39500
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39499
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update WebAssembly CODEOWNERS #39479
    Area-WasmSdk, 9.0.1xx
  • [wasm] Move `GenerateJSModuleManifest` from pack to sdk #39478
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk, 9.0.1xx

Merged

  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #39453
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix double write in StaticWebAssets.Tasks.csproj #39476
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable publishing in VMR #39311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #39444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Make sure package search exits with 1 or 0 in the SDK side #39463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Don't use the xunit return code when running in helix only #39271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Watch UI #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • No drive enumerations Fixes #38050 #38436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fingerprint and Hash for SWA. #39405
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39445
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Field and value as contextual keywords #7964

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update `Lock` object speclet #7989
  • Publish notes from extensions WG 2024-03-05 #7986

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582
  • Add proposal for state machine restriction updates #7994
  • Update ref-struct-interfaces.md #8000

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Formatting fixer doesn't fix formatting diagnostic #72534
    17.10
  • In SDK 8.0.2xx IDE0300 (collection expression) uses loose type matching which should not happen according to documentation #72532
  • Questions about XML Documentation #72528
  • Roslyn and .Net disagree about converting double.NaN to long #72526

Closed

  • VSTHRD004 is misreported in 17.9.3-alpha #71377
  • Test plan for "params Span<T>" #57049
    Backlog
  • INamedTypeSymbol.Constructors - Method sometimes fails to return information for private constructors #72473
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72533
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Always log LSP server processId and increase attach timeout #72531
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update to System.Text.Json for LSP generation #72530
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not report unchanged files in workspace-pull diagnostics #72529
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Remove portions of solution crawler" #72527
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update __arglist.md #72523
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove ImmutableHashMap in favor of ImmutableDictionary #72520
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Exclude VS-related packages on non-Windows #72470
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update VS SDK to 17.10.234-preview.1 #72359
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove redundant feature #72525
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add back interface used by TypeScript #72524
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Enhance supported cases for 'remove redundant operators' #72522
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix doc comment #72514
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Suppress Lock conversion warnings when using object equality operators #72459
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type, Next
  • Use ProvideSettingsManifest to specify Unfied Settings registration file #72429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Collect telemetry in OOP on how much benefit we could get from caching more solution snapshots. #72521
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #72519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Use the project cone information in Scope.FindAssetsAsync (part 2) #72512
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Onboard VB intellisense page to Unified Settings #72471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not put an equals and quotes when completing an xml attribute if present #72508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix InvalidCastException when initializing the properties of an undeclared class inside a lambda function #72480
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.10
  • Allow VS Code to provide razor source geneator references. #72482
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Antiforgery state doesn't always reach WebAssembly components #54533
  • IIS AspNetCoreModuleV2: random/endless recycles #54531
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens" Version="7.4.0" not working with OpenIdConnect ? (Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect Version 8.0.3)) #54530
  • TimeSpan shown as object in OpenAPI definition is not compatible with System.Text.Json serialization #54526
  • _framework/blazor.web.js & _framework/dotnet.js fail to load with 404 when changing the base URL of a .NET 8 Blazor Web App #54525
  • ASP.NET Core Identity .NET 8 two factor authenticator does not comply with the rfc6238 standard #54524
  • setting <Location Path="xxxx"> in web.config results in 404 from IISExpress #54523
  • dotnet-openapi generates illegal method names with leading numbers (and other errors) #54521
  • ASP.NET core inconsistent model binding from form-data and json when trying to bind to an IEnumerable<T> #54520

Closed

  • I have searched the existing issues #54532
  • AddOidcAuthentication Logout Not Sending State Query Parameter When Deployed #54515
  • Net8 uses the new JwtSecurityTokenHandler() WriteToken error. #52369
  • Identity: Blazor: Setting Cookie.SameSite = SameSiteMode.Strict cause unexpected AuthorizationView behavior for external logins #52253
  • Xml Decryption can throw before forwarding on to custom Activator instance #48910
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Error when upgrading Azure.Extensions.AspNetCore.DataProtection.Keys #54253
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Regression: ExtraQueryParams not sent when published #53409
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Merged

  • Improve usage of `Type.GetType` when activating types in data protection #54256
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, 9.0-preview3
  • Install java via native tools in CI #54421
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Improve route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54479
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove KeyManagementOptions copy constructor #54516
    area-dataprotection
  • add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #54508
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • add readme package for NuGet package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson #54504
    area-mvc
  • Add AddHubOptions extension on IServiceCollection #54163
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer #54492
    community-contribution, area-security
  • fix: remove double logging of BadHttpRequest errors #54395
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
